shape_1_per_frame1=n=18;     i=instance;   sa=i/324;
shape_1_per_frame2=
shape_1_per_frame3=x1=-.5+(i%(n*n))/(n*n);
shape_1_per_frame4=y1=-.5+(i%n)/n;
shape_1_per_frame5=
shape_1_per_frame6=t = n*n*6.28*sa + .5*sa + .5*q1 - 1.57;
shape_1_per_frame7=
shape_1_per_frame8=z1=1.3+.7*sin(x1+y1+q2);
shape_1_per_frame9=x= z1* ( x1 + .2*y1 ) /q6 ; 
shape_1_per_frame10=y= z1* ( 1.2*y1 + .6*x1 ) ; 
shape_1_per_frame11=
shape_1_per_frame12=rad *= .01*z1;
shape_1_per_frame13=
shape_1_per_frame14=x+= .3*q1;      y+= .3*q2;
shape_1_per_frame15=
shape_1_per_frame16=ang = 3.14/4 + t - (2*t+3.14)*y%2  - 2*t*x%2 + 4*t*x%2*y%2  ;
shape_1_per_frame17=
shape_1_per_frame18=x=(x-int(x)-x%2)*pow(-1,int(x));
shape_1_per_frame19=y=(y-int(y)-y%2)*pow(-1,int(y));
